resources.string: The monitoring panel of the Android application, which displays real-time values of temperature, humidity, and lumen intensity.
The scheduler of the Android application, allowing users to set up a schedule controlling the lights to turn on and off.
Users are able to control the light by switching on and off, and the temperature of the system by sliding the button.
Shows the other feature of the android application where in users can View and Modify or edit their information.
Sensor datas, The data can be displayed with graphs, allowing the user to easily track the details.
